channel.title: outliers on Not So Formal
channel.description: Recent content in outliers on Not So Formal

item.title: Dixon Q-Test
item.description: library(dplyr) library(outliers) set.seed(5678) get_case <- function(which_case = c("one", "two")){ # generate data from a normal distribution dat <- rnorm(n = 10, mean = 1000, sd = 100) %>% round() switch(which_case, # add outlier on the left "one" = c(dat, round(mean(dat) - sd(dat) * 3.5) ), # add outlier on the right "two" = c(dat, round(sd(dat) * 3.5 + mean(dat)) ) ) } Case One: Test Mininum Value by Default ——————————— vecs <- get_case("one") plot(rep(1,length(vecs)), vecs) boxplot(vecs, add = TRUE) dixon.
